'''"Kama"''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the {{Quest|Through the Mists}}.

==Profile==
At first, his name is shown as "Kama," but it is later revealed that he is the previous generation Kama who left [[Tsurumi Island]] several thousand years ago. The [[Kama|current Kama]] is his descendant.
